## Runtime.IResolveResourceTreeOptions.onEmptyBranch property

Controls how empty branch nodes are handled during tree composition. - 'allow': Include empty branches as empty objects in the result - 'omit': Exclude empty branches from the parent object - callback: Custom handler that can provide alternate values or recovery logic

**Signature:**

```typescript
onEmptyBranch?: 'allow' | 'omit' | EmptyBranchHandler;
```
